ygData.subject: Re: Harrasment and E'Ci...
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok I m glad it looks like this guild thing is going to be fixed. It sounds like Tarisimo doesn t want to talk about this reasonably, and that kind of makes me
ygData.messageBody:
Ok I'm glad it looks like this guild thing is going to be fixed.

It sounds like Tarisimo doesn't want to talk about this reasonably, and
that kind of makes me sad. Since as I understand he was running his guild
as an LGBT guild, it looks like the probable result of all this will be
conflict between LGBT players on E'ci.

Joking paranoid thought, could a homophobic guide have orchestrated this
all to bring about queer conflict on E'ci? Will this be spread to other
servers! =O

It looks like over the next couple days Mystical Alliance will be deleted
on E'ci and recreated under Deric (who may want to transfer ownership of
the guild to a regular E'ci list member to avoid the beurocacy of having
to log in regularly). After a settling down period, maybe someone who
hasn't been involved in all this, might try approaching Tarisimo and
seeing if any kind of peace is possible.

I'm ultimately a little curious about the unanswered questions here. How
did Tarisimo decide on the name Mystical Alliance for his queer guild. It
is a queer guild isn't it? Did he read our charter on the site and decide
to stat it on E'ci? Is there a *true* mystical alliance between queer EQ
players that would result in us coming up with the same name? 8)

- Christina
